:v-model.description: Use a v-model to get a reactive page alongside a total which represents the total of items. You can also use the page-count prop to define the number of items per page which defaults to 10.
:v-model.description_zh: Use a v-model to get a reactive page alongside a total which represents the total of items. You can also use the page-count prop to define the number of items per page which defaults to 10.

size.description: Use the size prop to change the size of the buttons.
size.description_zh: Use the size prop to change the size of the buttons.

:max.description: Use the max prop to set a maximum of displayed pages. Defaults to 7, being the minimum.
:max.description_zh: Use the max prop to set a maximum of displayed pages. Defaults to 7, being the minimum.

activeButton.description: Use the active-button and inactive-button props to customize the active and inactive buttons of the Pagination.
activeButton.description_zh: Use the active-button and inactive-button props to customize the active and inactive buttons of the Pagination.

inactiveButton.description: Use the active-button and inactive-button props to customize the active and inactive buttons of the Pagination.
inactiveButton.description_zh: Use the active-button and inactive-button props to customize the active and inactive buttons of the Pagination.

prevButton.description: Use the prev-button and next-button props to customize the prev and next buttons of the Pagination.
prevButton.description_zh: Use the prev-button and next-button props to customize the prev and next buttons of the Pagination.

nextButton.description: Use the prev-button and next-button props to customize the prev and next buttons of the Pagination.
nextButton.description_zh: Use the prev-button and next-button props to customize the prev and next buttons of the Pagination.

slots.name: prev
slots.description: Use the #prev and #next slots to set the content of the previous and next buttons.
slots.description_zh: 使用“#prev”和“#next”插槽设置上一个和下一个按钮的内容。

slots.name: next
slots.description: Use the #prev and #next slots to set the content of the previous and next buttons.
slots.description_zh: 使用“#prev”和“#next”插槽设置上一个和下一个按钮的内容。

slots.name: first
slots.description: use the #first and #last slots to set the content of the first and last buttons.
slots.description_zh: 使用 #first 和 #last 插槽设置第一个和最后一个按钮的内容。

slots.name: last
slots.description: use the #first and #last slots to set the content of the first and last buttons.
slots.description_zh: 使用 #first 和 #last 插槽设置第一个和最后一个按钮的内容。
